successes.title: The New ilumi. A Better Smartbulb.
successes.description: The Simplest, Brightest, & Most Intelligent Smart Bulb in the Universe!

Pledges.description:
A massive thank you for supporting ilumi nation! 
You are awesome.

LIGHT HEADED ILUMI T-SHIRT:
Help rep the ilumi nation with this limited edition custom designed tee. Add $20 to any existing pledge for your Smartbulbs without any extra shipping.

EARLY BIRD A19 SINGLE: 
Backer only Special Price! This 60W equiv standard bulb will be perfect for your bedside lamp or floor lamp.
Don't wait, only 500 available 
(MSRP $59.99)

EARLY BIRD BR30 SINGLE: 
Backer only Special Price! This 85W equiv flood light will be a welcome addition to your living room can, overhead, or track lighting
Don't wait, only 500 available 
(MSRP $69.99)

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL - A19 SINGLE: 
A special price for our Kickstarter supporters! This 60W equiv standard bulb will be perfect for your bedside lamp or floor lamp. 
Don't wait, only 500 available 
(MSRP $59.99)

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL - BR30 SINGLE: 
This 85W equiv flood light will be a welcome addition to your living room can, overhead, or track lighting.  
(MSRP $69.99)

241 SPECIAL- A19: 
Backer only Special Price, 2 for the Price of 1, to celebrate reaching $241k! For just $59, you can get 2 new ilumi A19 Smartbulbs for the price of 1. Hurry, this is limited to the first 100 people only!
(MSRP $119.98)

A19 TWO PACK: 
A special price on a pair of A19 ilumi Smarbtulbs for our Kickstarter supporters! These 60W equiv standard bulbs will be perfect for your bedside lamp or floor lamp. 
(MSRP $119.98)

BR30 TWO PACK: 
A special price on a pair of BR30 flood ilumi Smarbtulbs for our Kickstarter supporters! These 85W equiv flood light will be a welcome addition to your living room can, overhead, or track lighting.  
(MSRP $139.98)

EARLY BIRD COMBO: 
Deck out a room with two (2) A19 Smartbulbs and one (1) BR30 Flood Smartbulb and get a sweet deal! 
Don't wait, only 300 available 
(MSRP $189.97)

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL COMBO: 
Deck out a room with two (2) A19 Smartbulbs and one (1) BR30 Flood Smartbulb! At a special price for our Kickstarter supporters!
(MSRP $189.97)

A19 ROOM PACK: 
Receive a set of Four (4) A19 Smartbulbs. These 60W equiv bulbs will be perfect for lighting up any room in the house where you use a regular bulb. 
(MSRP $239.96)

BR30 ROOM PACK: 
Receive Four (4) new ilumi BR30 Smartbulbs. These 85W equiv flood lights will transform your living room, kitchen, or man-cave and where you use can, overhead, or track lighting. 
(MSRP $279.96)

WHOLE HOME UPGRADE: 
Enhance and connect your whole home by receiving a combo pack of ten (10) ilumi Smartbulbs. This includes five (5) of each of the A19 and BR30 new ilumi Smartbulbs. 
(MSRP $649.90)

CUSTOM JOB:
Pick your own color exterior finish for any ten (10) ilumi Smartbulbs. Our designers will work with you to make sure you get the exact color you want. 
We'll never do this again.

ILUMINATI:
Come spend a day with the ilumi team deep in the heart of Texas. We'll fly you and a friend to Dallas for a jam packed day where you'll assemble your own custom ilumi Smartbulbs, participate in a team brainstorm session, and we'll finish it off with great Texas BBQ and box seats to watch our favorite basketball team, the Dallas Mavericks. 
(Includes roundtrip airfare for two to Dallas from anywhere in the continental US.)
